title: Yergin: Oil moving back into balance with supply and demand
itunes:title: Yergin: Oil moving back into balance with supply and demand
description:
IHS's Dan Yergin weighs in on oil prices and the balance between supply and demand on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Michael McKee.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
